dict.acceptation: 使消释；使分解，使解体；（指委员会或集会）表决；消退（炎症等）；
决意，决定；（会议等的）决议；

sent.orig: Many students resolve resolve to study abroad after graduation.
sent.trans: 许多大学生都决定毕业后出国留学。

sent.orig: She acknowledges it will not be easy to resolve resolve differences nor end of viewsabuses.
sent.trans: 她承认要解决分歧或者终止谩骂不是简单的事情。

sent.orig: What's more, the design method can resolve many problems that traditional method can't resolve.
sent.trans: 而且，这种设计方法能解决很多传统“限制位移设计”方法不能解决的问题，具有广阔的应用前景。

sent.orig: Resolve to perform what you ought; perform without fail what you resolve.
sent.trans: 该做的一定要做，要做的一定要做好。

sent.orig: Resolution: Resolve to perform what you ought. Perform without fail what you resolve.
sent.trans: 决心：下定决心做你应该做的。把要解决的问题成功解决掉。
